# StereoPropertiesProvider

**Class**

The StereoPropertiesProvider serves the latest viewpoint properties on the device.

## Declaration

```swift
final class StereoPropertiesProvider
```

## Initializers

- **init()**: Initialize the StereoPropertiesProvider.

## Instance Properties

- **description**: A textual representation of this stereo properties provider.
- **latestViewpointProperties**: Returns the latest viewpoint properties, if available.
- **state**: The state of this stereo properties provider.

## Type Properties

- **isSupported**: Determines whether this device supports the stereo properties provider.
- **requiredAuthorizations**: The authorization type(s) required by the stereo properties provider.

## Rendering

- **ViewpointProperties**: The ViewpointProperties is a record of render camera transforms at some particular time.

## Conforms To

- CustomStringConvertible
- DataProvider
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
